T02n2908u_001:2: caraṇambhyoduhadvayaṃ| sādhakānāṃ [1] ca siddhyarthaṃ likhayate balimālikā|
T02n2908u_001:3: yenaiva balidadena srīṇaitāḥ sarvajantavaḥ| rakṣacakrādikaṃ sarvaṃ śobhanaṃ|
T02n2908u_001:4: bodhanaṃ tataḥ| balitatvaṃ mama krite jñātavyaṃ sādhusammataiḥ||
T02n2908u_001:6: vaśyābhicārikaṃ tathā| balyupahāḍamātreṇa sādhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ| māyā
T02n2908u_001:7: sumatisihena granthitā balimālikā| cintāmaṇirivābhātikaṇthastha mantrināṃ sadā|
T02n2908u_001:8: atra subāhutantroktagāthābhir balikaṃ srijetāḥ| piṭakaiḥ śakatair bhārair
T02n2908u_001:9: antośo'ñjalibhis tathā| tatvaikatra baliñ ca'rghaṃ gandhatoyādikavad etad
T02n2908u_001:10: evāsuraḥ| sarvabhujaṃ gasiddhāstārkṣaḥ suparṇṇaḥ kaṭapūtanāś ca||
T02n2908u_001:12: ca ye ke vibhūmauni vasanti divyāḥ| 'nyastaikajānuḥ| vrithipītalehaṃ
T02n2908u_001:13: kritāñjalir vijñāpayāmi tāṃs tāna| saputradāraiḥ sahabhrityāsaṃghaiḥ|
T02n2908u_001:14: śrutvā-ihāyantv anugrahārthāṃ| ye me tu priṣṭhi nivasanti bhūtāyo nandane ye ca
T02n2908u_001:15: surādayeṣu| ye codāyās taṃ girim antareṣu nāgeṣu sarveṣu ca ye vasanti| sarisu
T02n2908u_001:16: sarvāsu ca saṃgameṣu ratnālaye ca' pi kritādhvāsaḥ| vāpi taṭākeṣu ca sālpaleṣu
T02n2908u_001:17: kūpeṣu vajreṣu ca nirjhareṣu| ye grāmaghoṣe surakānane ca śūnyālaye devagriheṣu
T02n2908u_001:18: ye ca vihāracaityavasathāśrameṣu matheṣu śālāsu ca kuñjarānāṃ| ye bhūbhritāṃ citramriheva
T02n2908u_001:19: santirathyāsu vīthīṣu ca catvareṣu|ye [2] caikavrikṣeṣu mahāpatheṣu
T02n2908u_001:21: siṃhe bharikṣāddhyuṣitāsu ye ca vasanti ghorāsu mahāṭavīṣu||
T02n2908u_001:23: kritālayaś ca merau śmāśāneni vasanti yo ca| hriṣṭāpasannaḥ| prajāgandhamālyaṃ
T02n2908u_001:24: dhūpaṃ baliṃ dīpavardhañ ca bhaktya| grihṇantu bhuñjantu pipantu cedam idañ ca
T02n2908u_001:26: (1) oṃ vajrayoginī hrīḥ| tu ña| khaḥ pheṃ ña a ña|
T02n2908u_001:27: mama manaḥ siddha prayaccha baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā|
T02n2908u_001:30: sarvarogapraśamani sarvabhayavināśini idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha khāhi
T02n2908u_001:31: khāhi| sarvaduṣta mārana mārana vandha vandha| hana hana| daha daha| paca paca|
T02n2908u_001:32: māraya māraya| hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| parṇaśavaribaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:33: (3) oṃ mahākālāśāsano bakāriṇe| paścimakālo yam idaṃ
T02n2908u_001:34: ratnatrayābakarināṃ| yadi pratijñāṃ samarasi tadā| idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa kha
T02n2908u_001:35: kha khāhi khāhi| sarvaduṣṭasatvāna māra māra| grihṇa grihṇa| bandha bandha|
T02n2908u_001:36: hana hana| daha daha| paca paca| dīnam ekena māraya māraya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ
T02n2908u_001:38: (4) oṃ āḥ hūṃ hoḥ uṣṇīṣa sumbharāja| yamāntaka
T02n2908u_001:39: prajñāntaka padmātaka vighnāntaka acala ḍakkirāja nīladaṇḍa mahābalebhyaḥ|
T02n2908u_001:40: saparivarebhyaḥ idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dipañ cākṣataṃ dadāmahe| te
T02n2908u_001:41: cāgatya saparivarāḥ śīghram idaṃ baliṃ grihṇantu khādantu| pipantu jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ
T02n2908u_001:42: hoḥ santuṣṭvā mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kurvantu
T02n2908u_001:43: hūṃ [3] hūṃ phaṭ pahṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā| daśakrodhabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:45: kṣetrapālebhyo'nyabhays ca idaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ| dhūpaṃ dīpam akṣataṃ dadāmahe|
T02n2908u_001:46: te ca gatyasaparivāraḥ śīghram idaṃ baliṃ grihṇantu khādantu pipantu jaḥ hūṃ
T02n2908u_001:47: vaṃ hoḥ santuṣṭvā mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣavaraṇa guptiṃ kurvantu
T02n2908u_001:48: hūṃ hūṃ| phaṭ phaṭ| vajradhara ajñāpayati svāhā| kṣetrapālabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:50: samyaksaṃbuddhāya| tad yathā| oṃ suru suru| prasuru prasuru| tara tara| bhara
T02n2908u_001:51: bhara| sambhara sambhara| santarpaya santarpaya| sarvapretānī svāhā| apasarantvapataraprakṣiṇo
T02n2908u_001:52: dadāmy ahaṃ sarvalokadhātunivāsināṃ pretānām āhāramite| pretabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:55: dāpayāma idaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhanaivedyai disaṃ yuktaṃ grihitvā
T02n2908u_001:56: sukhasaumanyasya| lābhino bhavantu| sthānāñ ca nirupadrapaṃ kurvantu|
T02n2908u_001:57: sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānena te oṃ āḥ hūṃ| idam amritapiṇḍabhuktvā mama sarvastvānāñ
T02n2908u_001:58: ca śāntiṃ kurvantu svasti svāhā| samājikānāṃ sarvabhautibaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:60: grihṇantu baliṃ viśiṣṭaṃ| agnir yamo nairriti bhūpatiś ca| apāṃpatir
T02n2908u_001:61: vāyudhanapatiś ca| īśānabhūtādhipatiś ca| devāsūrdhvaṃ ca candrārkapitamahaś
T02n2908u_001:62: ca| devāḥ samastābhūmi ye ca nāgādharaguhyagaṇaiḥ sametāḥ pratipattidvaikanivedañ
T02n2908u_001:63: ca svakasvakasv eva deśasubhūtāḥ grihṇantuṣṭhaḥ| savamāḥ
T02n2908u_001:64: sapenyāpaputramitrasvajanaiḥ sametāḥ| [4] puṣpaṃ baliṃ dhūpaṃnivedanañ ca
T02n2908u_001:65: bhuñjantu jighrantu pipantu cedam idaṃ ca karmmasaphalaṃ yuṣantu| dikpālabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:66: (9) oṃ pheṃ hrīṃ hū jaḥ baliṃ raktapuṣpakāmarājasarvasiddha
T02n2908u_001:67: prayaccha mama'p ituttha cittakāna bhasmi kuru| saptapātālagataśatrūna
T02n2908u_001:68: pādatalaṃ kuru| sarvajanopaśāntiṃ kuru phaṭ svāhā| kāmarājabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:69: (10) oṃ hrīḥ ehy ehi ekajaṭīmamopanyutāna| śāntiṃ kuru
T02n2908u_001:70: puṣṭiṃ kuru mahāyakṣādhipataye idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa grihṇa paya grihṇa
T02n2908u_001:71: paya| paravidyāṃ ākarṣaya ākarṣaya| truṭa truṭa| muṭa muṭa| hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ
T02n2908u_001:73: (11) oṃ āḥ hrīṃ hrīṃ kurukulle| sarvasatvavaśaṃ kari
T02n2908u_001:74: sarvabhayabhayaṃ kari idaṃ bali gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dipañ cākṣataṃ dāmahe
T02n2908u_001:76: khādatha sivatha jighatha mama naḥ naḥ siddhiṃ prayacchatha oṃ āḥ| hrīṃ hrīṃ
T02n2908u_001:80: kritaśekharāya idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama sarvavighnāna ca turmārānani
T02n2908u_001:81: vāraya vāraya| trāsaya trāsaya| bhrama bhrama| chinda chinda| bhinda bhinda|
T02n2908u_001:82: nāśa nāśa| tāpa tāpa| śoṣa śoṣa| ccheda ccheda| bheda bheda| duṣṭasatvāna mama
T02n2908u_001:83: viruddhācittakāna bhasmi kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| caṇḍamahāroṣaṇabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:85: mahāyakṣasenāpataye| idaṃ baliṃ pañcamritaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi
T02n2908u_001:86: khāhi| samayam anusmara| jaḥ jaḥ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| jambhalabaliḥ| [5]
T02n2908u_001:89: raktābharaṇabhūṣitāya idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama sarvavighnāna hara hara|
T02n2908u_001:90: caturmārānani| vāraya vāraya| trāsaya trāsaya| bhrama bhrama| chinda chinda|
T02n2908u_001:91: vinda vinda| nāṣaya nāṣaya| śoṣaya śoṣaya| cinda cinda| bheda bheda| hūṃ hūṃ
T02n2908u_001:92: phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| paścata pratyaṃśena cārayeta| indrāya namaḥ hrīḥ yamāya namaḥ
T02n2908u_001:93: strīḥ varuṇāya namaḥ vi kuverāya namaḥ kri agnaye namaḥ ta| īsvarāyanamaḥ ā
T02n2908u_001:94: nairritaye namaḥ navāyave namaḥ na| candāya namaḥ hūṃ| arkāya namaḥ hūṃ|
T02n2908u_001:95: brahmamaṇe namaḥ phaṭ| vasudhārayai namaḥ phaṭ| avilamacitriṇi namaḥ svāhā|
T02n2908u_001:96: sarvabhūtebhyo namaḥ svāhā| ha hā hi hu hū hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| raktayamāribaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:100: bhagavati durgatte| riṇi āgaccha āgaccha| idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama
T02n2908u_001:101: sarvaśatrūna hana hana| khāhi khāhi| sarvabandhanavyādhigrahāna daha daha|
T02n2908u_001:102: bhedaya bhedaya| phoṭaya phoṭaya| sphoṭaya sphoṭaya| sarvasiddhiṃ me prayaccha
T02n2908u_001:103: śāntiṃ puṣtiṃ rakṣaṃ me kuru sarvakali kalahavi grahavi| vadavighnorvādavyaktikarāṃś
T02n2908u_001:104: cchindaś cchinda bhanda bhanda| bhañjaya bhañjaya| kṣobhaya kṣobhaya| stambhaya
T02n2908u_001:105: stambhaya| hrīṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ| hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ| āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| durgottārābaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:106: (16) oṃ vajrāralli hoḥ vajraḍākinyaḥ samayas tvaṃ
T02n2908u_001:107: driśya hoḥ vajrāñjalye ūrdhavikacayābaliṃ davyātani sādhake| oṃ kha kha| [6]
T02n2908u_001:109: baliṃ grihṇantu samayarakṣantu mama sarvasiddhiṃ prayacchanta yathaivaṃ
T02n2908u_001:110: yatheṣṭi| bhuñjatha khādatha| pipatha| jighratha| mātikramatha| mama
T02n2908u_001:111: sarvākāratayā| satsukha| vipriddhaye sahāyakā bhavantu hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā|
T02n2908u_001:114: mahācaṇḍavajrapāṇaye mama sarvaśatrūnāṃ sarvagātrāṇi saṃkocaya saṃkocaya|
T02n2908u_001:115: bhañjaya bhañjaya| moṭaya moṭaya| bhagavati vajraśrīṃkhale| vajrapāṇi nākacūrya
T02n2908u_001:116: ākarṣaya ākarṣaye| cakṣurvandha śirovandha sarvagātraṇi tāraya māraya puṣpaṃ
T02n2908u_001:117: dhūpaṃ gandhaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa svāhā| vajraśrīṃkhalābaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:118: (18) oṃ vajravārāhi idaṃ baliṃ kha kha| khāhi khāhi|
T02n2908u_001:120: samayarakṣantu yathaivaṃ yathaiṣṭaṃ bhuñjatha khādatha pipatha jighratha
T02n2908u_001:121: mātikramatha mama sarvākāratayā satsukha vaṃ vriddhaye sahāyakā bhavantu hūṃ
T02n2908u_001:124: sarvabhayahare idaṃ baliṃ pañcāmritaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāni|
T02n2908u_001:125: sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭana mama krite stambhaya stambhaya| mohāya mohāya vandāya
T02n2908u_001:126: vandāya| hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ| sarvaduṣṭastambhani vajratāre svāhā|
T02n2908u_001:129: namaḥ samantasaṃghānāṃ| oṃ sitātapatra| oṃ vimala| oṃ śaṃkara| oṃ
T02n2908u_001:132: yena kena citritaṃ tat sarvāna cchinda cchinda bhinda bhinda| cira cira| giri
T02n2908u_001:133: giri| mara mara| hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ|
T02n2908u_001:140: lokadhātvanantavyūhaprasaragaganasamāḥ sarvalokapālāḥ sarvasatvāñ ca tad yathā|
T02n2908u_001:143: vemacitrivrithividevitāḥ saparivārā idaṃ baliṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhaṃ| naivedyādikaṃ
T02n2908u_001:145: manuṣyāna manuṣyāna jambhayata stambhayata| bhandayata| vidhvansayata| mama
T02n2908u_001:147: bodhimaṇḍaparyantaṃ ḍhaukayata mama sahāyavyāṃ| śāntiṃ puṣṭaṃ rakṣāñ ca kuru oṃ
T02n2908u_001:148: āḥ mañjuvajra maṃ hūṃ svāhā| mañjuvajravāgiśvarabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:150: sarvaśābaripūrike bhāgavati varade namaste namaste punar api punar api namaste
T02n2908u_001:151: mama devimātar anugraha kuru idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| oṃ vajravairocanīye svāhā| acalakalpokto
T02n2908u_001:153: (23) oṃ sarvatathāgatasamayam anusmara hūṃ hūṃ| pheṃ
T02n2908u_001:154: pheṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| rakṣāgagana kṣepabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:155: (24) oṃ vajraḍākini idaṃ baliṃ hrī hrī| ha haiṃ haṃ
T02n2908u_001:156: hiḥ| phaṭ mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ kuru svāhā| aṣṭamrācaturddaśyāni yame
T02n2908u_001:158: (25) oṃ vajraḍākini idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| ha ha ha
T02n2908u_001:159: haḥ kha kha kha kha| ya ya ya ya| a a a aḥ| mama siddhiṃ prayaccha hūṃ phaṭ
T02n2908u_001:163: pradāyamañjubuddhisiddhidadāya idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ madhu|
T02n2908u_001:164: śarkarādisahitaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khādi khādi| mama śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ
T02n2908u_001:165: rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kuru kuru| oṃ āḥ dhīḥ hūṃ svāhā| a-ra-pa-ca-na-baliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:166: (27) oṃ mahāśrīyetrī hūṃ hrī oṃ idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa
T02n2908u_001:167: grihṇa| trailokyasaṃsārāya dārivyāgajaṃ vidāraya sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭana bhañja
T02n2908u_001:168: bhañja| agaccha agaccha| bhagavati mama nidhiṃ dehi svāhā| mahāśrītārābaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:169: (28) oṃ bhagavati aṣṭamahā| bhayatāriṇi śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ
T02n2908u_001:171: ca rakṣāṃ kuru aṣṭamahādāruṇabhayebhyas tāraya tāraya| divyarūpiṇi saume mukhi
T02n2908u_001:172: idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| svāhā| aṣṭamahābhayatārabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:173: (29) oṃ bhagavati cchin namaste praśaste| oṃ
T02n2908u_001:175: vajravairocaṇīye idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa kha kha| khāhi khāhi| mama
T02n2908u_001:176: viruddhacittakāna bhasmi kuru saptapātālagataśatrūna pādatalaṃ kuru sarvatra
T02n2908u_001:177: mama śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā|
T02n2908u_001:181: baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| sarvaduṣṭasatādamaka| ha hā hi hī hu
T02n2908u_001:182: hū he hai ho hau haṃ haḥ phaṭ svāhā| oṃ vajramahākālabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:184: yogaśatasahasrakāra idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ grihṇa grihṇa yena
T02n2908u_001:185: kena cin mama yantramantratantraviṣacūrṇaprayagādikaṃ kritaṃ kāritaṃ tat sarvaṃ
T02n2908u_001:186: hana hana| daha daha| paca paca| matha matha| garja garja| tarja tarja|
T02n2908u_001:189: mahāmāyurimahāśītavani mahāmantrānusārini buddhiś caiva mahātmāno vidyādevyo
T02n2908u_001:190: mahābaliḥ| māmakībhrikutī caiva tārāvitāthāṃ kuśīvajraśriṃkhalāśvetā tathaiva
T02n2908u_001:191: ca| mahākālī ca dūtya'pi ca vajradūtyas tathā baliḥ| supāśīvajrapāśā ca
T02n2908u_001:193: aparājitāmahādevīkālakarṇīmahābalā| tathā dhanye mahābhāgāpadmakuṇḍalir eva ca|
T02n2908u_001:194: puṣpadaṇḍīmaṇicūḍāsvanyakeśī ca piṃgalā| mahātejā tathā devī dhanyā ca vidyun
T02n2908u_001:196: mahābhāgādhanyāladkeśvarī tathā| anyāś ca bahavo vidyāḥ satvānugrakārikāḥ| tad
T02n2908u_001:197: yathā| kālikarālikumbhāṇḍiśaṃkhini| kamalākṣi| [10] hārīti| harikeṣi| śrīmati|
T02n2908u_001:198: haripiṅgale| lambe| pralambe| kālapāśe| kalaśodari| yamadūti| yamarākṣasi|
T02n2908u_001:199: bhūtagrasani| pratīcchemaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ baliṃ ca dāsyāmaṃ rakṣī
T02n2908u_001:200: kuru mama sarvasatvānāñ ca sarvabhayo padravebhyo jāvatu| parṣaśataṃ paśyatu
T02n2908u_001:203: mahāśvete| mahānīlaratnapadgajapustakahaste idaṃ baliṃ pañcāmritaṃ bhuñja
T02n2908u_001:204: jighra| oṃ picu picu| prajñāvardhani| jvala jvala| medhāvardhani| dhiri dhiri|
T02n2908u_001:205: buddhi vardhani svāhā| oṃ śrutismritivijaye| dhīḥ dhāraṇīye svāhā| prajñāpāramitābaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:207: śrutismritimahāvijaye svāhā| sarvayakṣiṇi sametā śīghram āgacchantu| idaṃ baliṃ
T02n2908u_001:208: grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| oṃ dharaṇi dharaṇi svāhā| vasudhārabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:210: sarvārtha sādhani| sarvasatvāṃ śaṅkari| imaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha|
T02n2908u_001:211: khāhi khāhi| hūm phāṭ hrīṃ hrīṃ svāhā| prasannatārabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:213: cālaya| saṃghaṭṭaya| mattamātaṃge| avidhehe| idaṃ baliṃ bhuñja jighra oṃ jāḥ
T02n2908u_001:217: trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ satyanadevādikam| ye cānye samayena tiṣṭhate tānavabhuṣisvāmi
T02n2908u_001:218: śīghram idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| [11] oṃ mala mala| tulu tulu| mulu mulu| culu
T02n2908u_001:219: culu| dhama dhama| radga radga| radgapaya radgapaya| pūraya pūraya| āśāṃ me
T02n2908u_001:222: (38) oṃ dhvajāgrakeyūre| jaya jaya| vijaya vijaya|
T02n2908u_001:223: jayāvahini| mama sarvaśatrūṃ jambhaya jambhaya| stambhaya stambhaya| matha
T02n2908u_001:224: matha| grasa grasa| hūṃ rakṣa rakṣa māṃ bhagavāṃ| imaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa|
T02n2908u_001:225: bhañja bhañja| parasainyaṃ vidhvansāya vidhvansāya| śatrūna śatrūna cala cala
T02n2908u_001:226: cili cili| tulu tulu| gala gala| kili kili| kulu kulu| sarvatathāgatāvalokite
T02n2908u_001:227: svāhā| guṇarājaprābhāse svāhā| candrārkavimale svāhā| sarvanakṣatracamikariṇe
T02n2908u_001:228: svāhā| rakṣa rakṣa| sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ svāhā| dhvajāgrakeyūrabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:229: (39) oṃ namo bhagavati uṣṇiṣavijaye mama mrityu nāśaya
T02n2908u_001:230: nāśaya| vināśaya vināśaya| vidhvansāya vidhvansāya| idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa|
T02n2908u_001:231: dirghāyuṣka me kuru svāsti svāhā| uṣṇiṣavijayābaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:233: nīlotpalahastāya idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa titā babhujya śānti kuru sarvasiddhaṃ
T02n2908u_001:234: kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ| siddhaikavīrabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:237: sarvamārabalavināśanāya idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama vighnāna hara hara
T02n2908u_001:238: caturmārāṇa nivāraya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| yamāntakabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:240: baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| mama sarvavighnāna ccheda ccheda|
T02n2908u_001:241: bheda bheda| drutaṃ| daha daha| paca paca| [12] matha matha| āḥ vighnāntakrita
T02n2908u_001:246: śīghraṃ āgaccha āgaccha| idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama sarvavighnāna hara
T02n2908u_001:247: hara| śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāñ ca me kuru hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| grahamātrikābaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:251: dugdhādisahitaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| māṃ sarvasatvāś ca narakādiduḥkhād uttaraya khād
T02n2908u_001:252: uttaraya| uddhara| uddhara| samuddhara samuddhara| buddhasatyena dharmasatyena
T02n2908u_001:253: saṃghasatyena satyavāde satyena oṃ āḥ hriḥ hūm phaṭ svāhā| sarvalokeśvarabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:256: dugdhādisahitaṃ grihitvā babhujya śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāñ ca me kuru oṃ āḥ hrīḥ
T02n2908u_001:261: samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāvaya oṃ āḥ sugatavajratuṣṭya hoḥ hūṃ svāhā|
T02n2908u_001:265: aṣṭamahābhaya hare khaḍgāñjanapādukabhadraghaṭāni siddhide| bhagavati tāre idaṃ
T02n2908u_001:266: baliṃ pañcāmritaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama mrityuṃ nāśaya nāśaya| oṃ tāre tuttāre
T02n2908u_001:270: grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| mahāvasuma me dehi dadāya svāhā|
T02n2908u_001:272: (49) oṃ āḥ hrīṃ hūṃ śuklaikajaṭī idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa
T02n2908u_001:273: grihṇa| ghāṭaya sarvaduṣṭāna hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| sarvamārabalavināśanāśārthaṃ
T02n2908u_001:277: nānopakaraṇaduḥkhasahitaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| mama na siddhiṃ
T02n2908u_001:278: prayaccha oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| nāgabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:281: divyagandhavarṇarasopetaṃ upabhujya māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca saṃsāduḥkhārṇavāt
T02n2908u_001:282: saṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyasi| oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| maitreyabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:285: svāhā| idaṃ baliṃ bhuñja jigha phulladhūpamāṃ sapiṃgha ammasappa
T02n2908u_001:286: sādhakhāntikhuṇi-phaṭagāda hūṃ svāhā| oṃ akāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ
T02n2908u_001:287: ādyanutpannatvāna oṃ [14] āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| śrīherukabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:288: (53) oṃ sahajasamvara āḥ hūṃ āgaccha āgaccha śīghraṃ
T02n2908u_001:289: idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| bhuktvā triptiṃ kritvā sarvasatvānāṃ śāntiṃ kritvā
T02n2908u_001:291: (54) oṃ tāre sarvebhya hare mama krite duṣṭa|
T02n2908u_001:292: sarvaduṣṭasatvāna jambhaya jambhaya| mohaya mohaya| mama śāntiṃ kuru|
T02n2908u_001:293: sarvavighnaśāntiṃ kare prakritaṃ prabhāsvare idaṃ baliṃ pañcāmritaṃ grihṇa
T02n2908u_001:294: grihṇa| kha kha khāhi khāhi| puṣṭiṃ kuru rakṣavaraṇaguptiṃ kuru sarvasiddhim me
T02n2908u_001:295: prayaccha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ| sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭastambhanitāre svāhā|
T02n2908u_001:297: (55) oṃ vajraghaṇṭe āḥ vajraghaṇṭe raṇi raṇi| praraṇa praraṇa|
T02n2908u_001:299: vajrasatvahridaye santoṣanakari hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| saddharmapāṭhārthaṃ
T02n2908u_001:300: ghaṇṭaṃ vādayannena mantrena dadyāta| dīpadhūpaṃ gandhanaivedy apuṣpatāmbūlaṃ
T02n2908u_001:301: ca yathāvidhim ādātabyaṃ| tataḥ krito vaḥ sarvasatvārtha ityādinā| oṃ
T02n2908u_001:303: (56) oṃ brahmādyā devatāḥ sarve indrādya| mama
T02n2908u_001:304: rakṣakāḥ nāgagandharvayakṣāś ca saṃtuṣṭā balinā sadā| oṃ akāro mukhaṃ
T02n2908u_001:305: sarvadharmāṇāṃ ādyanutpannatvāna oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| sarvakārmikabaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:311: vidāraṇi mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ kuru paśyaṃ kuru sarvadeva
T02n2908u_001:313: paca matha matha vidhvānsaya mahāsāhasrapramardani idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa maṃ
T02n2908u_001:314: sarvastvāś ca rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| mahāsāhasrapramardinibaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:316: śāntiṃ kuru puṣṭiṃ kuru paśyaṃ kuru
T02n2908u_001:318: daha daha| māraya māraya| garjaya garjaya| idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| māṃ
T02n2908u_001:319: sarvasatvāś ca rakṣa rakṣa| hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| mahāmāyuribaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:321: mama sarvastvānāñ ca śāntiṃ kuru puṣṭiṃ kuru paśyaṃ kuru bhūtapretapiśācādinā
T02n2908u_001:322: māraya māraya kāraya kāraya tarjaya tarjaya idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa rakṣa
T02n2908u_001:323: rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| mahāśītavanibaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:325: grihṇa grihṇa [16] mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ kuru puṣṭiṃ kuru paśyaṃ kuru
T02n2908u_001:326: bhūtapretapiśācādinā māraya māraya mardaya māṃ sarvasatvāś ca rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ
T02n2908u_001:329: baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ kuru puṣṭiṃ kuru paśyaṃ kuru
T02n2908u_001:330: mama sarvaśatrūṃ māraya māraya hrīṃ haḥ phaṭ svāhā| mahāmantrānusāriṇibaliḥ|
T02n2908u_001:332: samāpta| namo bhagavate siddhi siddhe mocani mokṣani muktre amale vimale
T02n2908u_001:333: nirmale aṇḍare paṇḍare maṅgalaṃ| hiraṇye garbhe sarvatrāpratihate svāhā| [17]
